pageProduct.name: Palmers Cocoa Butter Formula Moisturising Body Oil 250ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Moisturising Body Oil is a lightweight oil to hydrate and soften skin. Absorbs instantly for a radiant, healthy-looking glow.

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Moisturising Body Oil is a light oil specially formulated with intensively moisturising pure Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E for a radiant, healthy glow, and to hydrate and soften skin. Cocoa Butter: Naturally harvested from cocoa beans, cocoa butter is a rich, nutrient-packed super ingredient loaded with antioxidant CMPs (Cocoa Mass Polyphenols) for superior skin care and moisture barrier protection.

Suitable For: All skin types.

Product Claims: Hydrates and softens skin

Size: 250mL

KEY FEATURES

• Pours moisture back into the skin
• Absorbs quickly
• Non greasy formula
• 48 hour moisture
• Vegan

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes. Guard against slipping.

Ingredients

Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Isopropyl Myristate, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Squalane, Fragrance (Parfum), BHT, Zea Mays (Corn) Oil, Beta-Carotene (CI 40800), Geraniol, Coumarin, Citronellol, Linalool.

Contains: Cocoa Butter, Vitamin E

Directions

AFTER SHOWER/BATH: Apply to damp skin to lock in moisture. BATH OIL: Add 1-2 capfuls to warm water for soothing spa bath. MASSAGE OIL: Warm oil in hands to apply to dry skin as a massage oil for an instant radiance boost.
